subject: Horse Racing
Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
Breeders' Cup (Horse Races)
lead_paragraph: Chad Brown has built a powerhouse stable that will be showcased when he sends out 11 starters in the 13-race Breeders’ Cup World Championships on Friday and Saturday.
snippet: Chad Brown has built a powerhouse stable that will be showcased when he sends out 11 starters in the 13-race Breeders’ Cup World Championships on Friday and Saturday.
